title: Does Anybody Want to Win the East?
description:
Jalen & Jacoby discuss which of the top 4 teams will take the 1-seed in the Eastern Conference. Jalen still wants to see James Harden perform against the top teams before the playoffs. We also breakdown the key that will decide the MVP race between Nikola Jokic and Joel Embiid. How are the Grizzlies so good without Ja Morant? What should the 49ers do with Jimmy G? Plus, will Zion Williamson be on a new NBA team in the near future?
 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
